node.excerpt: Intro In this article, we’ll have a very brief look at what Exception is and go in depth about discussing the chained exceptions in Java. Simply put, an exception is an event that disturbs the normal flow of the program's execution. Let's now see exactly how we can chain exceptions to get better…

frontmatter.title: Chained Exceptions in Java
